Title: The More You Moe
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Tom Herpich, Steve Wolfhard, Kent Osborne (story), Jack Pendarvis (story), Steve Wolfhard (story), Adam Muto (story)
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Chuck McCann, Andy Milonakis
Plot: On BMO's birthday, Moe comes to visit and give BMO a special birthday mission. But while BMO is away, Moe begins to overstay his welcome at the tree house.
